refnamediv.refpurpose: Generate line break after each term within a multi-term varlistentry?

refsection.para: Set the variablelist.term.break.after parameter to generate a line break between terms in a multi-term varlistentry.

note.para: If you set the variablelist.term.break.after, you may also want to set the value of the variablelist.term.separator parameter to an empty string (to suppress rendering of the default comma and space after each term).
